name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 30, Wuhan.
A man in a skirt was sleeping outside the Jianghan Customs Building. Then several special police officers holding shields and steel forks appeared beside him and handcuffed him and took him away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Xiaohongshu, employees of China Construction from all over the country revealed that they were owed wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from 21:30 on July 1, Pingjiang County, Hunan Province, upgraded the county's flood emergency response to Level I. Pingjiang County issued a major flood notice, asking residents in the central urban area not to go out or watch unless necessary, so as not to affect rescue work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to local netizens, the cause of the flood was related to the flood discharge from the upstream reservoir. One netizen complained that "the flood discharge was not notified in advance. If it had been notified in advance, a lot of losses could have been avoided."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, in Xiangxi, Hunan, homeowners of Xianghe Jiangshan Community hung banners on their balconies to protest against the property management company's arbitrary charges.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 2 (Released) A video circulated online showed that a salesperson of BYD's brand Denza turned on the intelligent driving function when a user was test driving the vehicle, and then said that the user did not need to hold the steering wheel with both hands or step on the brakes, and the vehicle would stop automatically when there was an obstacle in front. In the end, when there was a vehicle in front, the intelligent driving did not recognize and automatically stop, causing the test drive car to rear-end the vehicle in front. BYD has not yet commented on this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, the Law School of Fudan University issued a statement on the graduation ceremony attack on teachers, and decided to expel the attacker Xia.
After violating epidemic prevention regulations, cheating on exams, insulting teachers, and beating professors, Xia, a student from Taiwan, was finally expelled from school as he wished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, China News Weekly reported: It is an open secret in the tanker transportation industry that food liquids and chemical liquids are mixed and transported without cleaning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, Reuters reported that all employees of China Construction Bank's head office had their salaries cut, and the higher the position, the greater the salary cut, at least 10%.
People familiar with the matter said that most branch employees had a larger salary cut than the head office.
https://t.co/pa9OCecDio

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Weilai employee posted on Maimai that Weilai Automobile laid off employees due to "organizational structure adjustment". The company required all laid-off employees to hand in their mobile phones and to be isolated in a small room after the discussion.
Secondly, the company directly deactivated the employee account and even cleared the office equipment before the two parties signed the agreement and received the unilateral termination notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 2, press releases by multiple media outlets including Phoenix.com, New Yellow River, and China Newsweek that had previously reported that "Ma Weidu's company suddenly laid off employees" were deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Starting from July 2024, the lower limit of the social security and medical insurance payment base in Chengdu will be adjusted to 4,511 yuan, and the monthly social security payment will be 1,599.6 yuan after the adjustment. Many Chengdu citizens posted complaints.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, Fujian Baoneng Law Firm sent a letter requesting the local bar association to disclose the use of membership fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, Caixin reported that the audit pointed out that 27 counties forcibly collected 1.466 billion yuan in financial subsidies from 1,245 village collectives, which were mainly used to repay debts or lend to foreign countries. Recently, Hou Kai, Auditor General of the National Audit Office, was entrusted by the State Council to disclose the above information in the "State Council's Audit Report on the Implementation of the Central Budget and Other Fiscal Revenues and Expenditures in 2023" made to the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 2, blogger "何光伟v" posted that lawyer He Weimin made a special trip from Guangzhou to Qingdao to attend the hearing on lawyer Yu Kai's proposed one-year suspension of practice. As a result, the security guards of the Qingdao Municipal Bureau of Justice not only blocked him from entering the door, but also violently pushed him down, causing him injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, Yiyang, Hunan. A sudden flood hit Jiangnan Qingyang Village, Anhua County, and thousands of chickens in a breeding farm were drowned. Farmer Ms. Wang said that the flood came too quickly and there was no time to evacuate. She had raised chickens for more than a month and had eaten tens of thousands of feeds, with a loss of about 100,000 yuan. The vegetables planted by nearby villagers were also gone. The flood has now receded, and it receded quickly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: test you

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on July 2, the "2023 National Judicial Auction Market Monitoring Report" showed that the number of judicial auction houses listed for auction nationwide in 2023 reached 796,000, an increase of 36.7% over the previous year, setting a new record high.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, the Global Times published an article saying that we should be wary of digital hatred becoming a traffic password. However, the comment section has opened the selection of comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 1, the 103rd anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party, the People's Daily published an article: Governments at all levels must get used to living a tight life.

name: 李老师不是你老师

content:
July 2, Jingxian Home, Lixian Town, Daxing District, Beijing. 
People protested against the property management company's collection of parking fees, and many people were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 2, water conditions in Jiujiang, Jiangxi

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, Zhongshan Memorial Middle School, a key middle school in Guangdong Province, clearly stated in its enrollment brochure that it would not admit students with a history of depression.
Netizens commented: They do not admit students with depression, but in the end they have trained many students with depression.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 30, Baoding, Hebei.
Blogger "Xiao Ma Ge" found traffic police playing games during working hours, so he filmed them.
The police then hid in the police car and tried to escape

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 1, the latest average salary in Shenzhen was released: the annual average salary is 174,640 yuan, equivalent to 14,553 yuan/month, an increase of 823 yuan/month compared to 22 years ago.
After the announcement, netizens questioned and ridiculed it. Netizens replied: Why? I only get 2,360 yuan. Who took my 10,000 yuan?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"One-click entry"
A netizen submitted a post to a 211 journalism and communication college in Guangdong. In order to ensure the employment rate, the college issued "research assistant/management assistant" agreements to graduates who had not yet found a job, and the counselors stamped them to cooperate with the fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, He Zhijuan and several other female lawyers were violently treated by bailiffs at the Yunyang District Court in Guiyang.
On the same day, during the trial of a blackmail case, the Yunyang District Procuratorate added a prosecutor to appear in court, and the lawyers asked to see the notice of his appearance in court and make a copy. The presiding judge asked the clerk to give the document to the lawyers for review and told them that they could only make a copy after the court session.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lawyer He Zhijuan's statement on the violent enforcement by the Guiyang Yunyan District Court bailiffs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 2 (Released) Wuhan, Hubei. A woman said that Wuhan Haotianyuan Company defaulted on project payment, causing her husband with advanced lung cancer and her son in a vegetative state to miss the best treatment time. In the end, the woman had to take her family to Wuhan to block the road to collect the debt.
The police at the scene said: They are indeed in great difficulty, I can understand it very well, but I really can't

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 1, Wuhan, Hubei. A takeaway boy tried to wade through water to deliver flowers, but was dissuaded by the surrounding citizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 2, Binzhou, Shandong. Xindian Town seized villagers’ land to build a highway and forced construction without paying any compensation.
On that day, villagers knelt down in the rain to block the road, and some villagers were beaten and hospitalized.
